row.name: JOBS.WIN.TECHNICAL_FLOW.MIDDLEWARE.NI2
row.description: Create an initial middleware NI2 Json file

row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred
:set &HND_LINE# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'{') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"appMiddleware": {') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"id": "Middelware_ign_531p_20180306",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"name": "middleware_ign_531_06032018",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"status": "ACTIVE",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"description": "autre installation",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"installationDate": 20171027141545,') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"updateDate": 20171027141545,') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"lightSystem": {"id": "vm_ign_500p_20180306"},') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"sla": {"id": "SVC-00058710"},') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"middlewareSoftware": {"id": "SOF-00006461"') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'}') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'}') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'}') :set &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND_LINE#,&JSON_FILE_PATH#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,APPEND) :close_process &HND_LINE#
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
